attributes.action: Public Transport should be free for people under 18.
attributes.additional_details: I think bus fare prices are absolutely extortionate. Something which I cannot afford being fairly young. So prices being as high as £4 (single) to go 6 miles down the road is just ridiculous. Especially as that is a lot of money which would be a useful saving for me and my parents. I strongly believe that Public Transport should be free for those under 18, and also that the private bus companies shouldn't be allowed to charge whatever they like.
